resources.string: I often came to this site for specific details of certain NPC\'s or enemies. This website alone was a huge boon to me during the development of this app. Thank you to all the developers of that website!
Google is my number one any time I need some quick information. A quick search and a glimpse of the results can go a long way paired with a bit of other research.

As someone who is learning how to develop Android applications in a variety of ways, this website is perfect for figuring out how to build a feature, or how to fix a feature in the app that just doesn\'t quite want to work. Thank you for the in depth, and incredibly well designed documentation Android!
To get a hold of me, send me an email @ charlestdjames1@gmail.com

I have a great deal of time spent playing Bloodborne, and I absolutely love this game. Between four play-throughs, the strong love I have for this game, and the amazing group of resources I have listed above, this app has been made possible.
